select oi.id, oi.code, oi.room_code, oi.start_date, oi.end_date, oi.rent_day, oi.days, oi.total_price, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.del_flag, oi.order_status, oi.recede_flag, ri.name, rt.type_name, ri.images, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card from order_info oi left join room_info ri on (ri.code = oi.room_code) left join room_type rt on (rt.id = ri.`type`) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1 and oi.del_flag = '0'
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND oi.order_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderStatus},'%')
AND ri.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.userId}
order by oi.create_date desc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(SUM(oi.total_price), 0) AS price FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
